title: Are there things that China cannot manufacture or does not have the technology to manufacture? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, for example, some kind of aircraft eigine, among a lot of others. Actually, none of the countries can produce (or have the techniques to produce) all of the industry products. This is partially a result of the so called globalization. The countries which are involved in globalization have to cooperate with each other, even if they are enemies.
